data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AREND cruise from Texel to Curaçao started at 1752-06-17
Ship: Arend, Start of voyage: 1752-06-17, End of voyage: 1752-08-09, Voyage: Texel - Curacao, 1st Observer: Abraham Taalman (Kapitein), Company: ADM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
